root.name: Master of Illusion
root.description: Master of Illusion is not so much a game as it is an interactive toy. The game allows you to do a variety of magic tricks which use your DS as an "assistance" of sorts.. The game comes with a pack of playing cards which factor into some of the tricks you can perform. Upon the release of the DSi, Nintendo began releasing a number of tricks from this games ala cart, under the moniker Master of Illusion: Express.
